scenario.name: Oretending a inter-TAS deflect to an agent
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 7 Subject: Performance Test X-TAS-PBX-To: <sip:89311@217.214.169.175:5060;transport=UDP;user=phone;hostname=UC201MICCTAS03;cst-id=1126904> X-TAS-PBX-From: <sip:+46725098830@10.59.27.11;user=phone>;tag=efbe9060 X-TAS-PBX-Request-URI: sip:89311@217.214.169.175:5060;transport=UDP;hostname=UC201MICCTAS03;cst-id=1126904 X-TAS-Action: Inter-TAS-deflect X-TAS-Target: <sip:55554@10.105.79.49:5060;csrv=div-bypass> X-TAS-DeflectVariant: Normal Diversion: <sip:79100@10.59.27.11>;reason=unconditional;privacy=off;private_privacy=private_off X-TAS-Peer: <sip:+46725098830;dev-type=External@10.105.79.49:5060;cst-id=1126904;is-monitor=False>;tag=TAS_fErWps0283 Privacy: none;private_none Reason: tas;cause=deflect Supported: timer, replaces Session-Expires: 1800 Min-SE: 90 Alert-Info: <urn:alert:source:external> Alert-Info: <urn:alert:service:normal> Allow: INVITE, OPTIONS, BYE, ACK, CANCEL, INFO, REGISTER, REFER, PRACK, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, UPDATE, PUBLISH Referred-By: <sip:89105@10.105.79.49:5060;user=phone;transport=TCP;cst-id=1126904> P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:+46725098830@10.59.27.11> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
